channel.title: Need walk through on how to make a private server please! (look nside)
channel.description:
Hello im on a laptop i have a router but not connected to a desktop computer but router still works...i want to make a private server but dont no how!! and its frustrating please walk me through i have an aim s/n it dxhotshot101 so u can message me on aim at anytime or email me at aisem10@hotmail.com or just simply message/post here... if you help me your reward will be 1) admin place 2)50k rs cash + 1k mith arrows thats a pretty good reward for helpin eh? ok this is what i got done 1) downloaded a source from the download list (phonescape) 2) have winrar 3)have hamachi (if needed i am willing to make a hamachi server)
PLEASE HELP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
